name: plaintive
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to describe something that sounds slightly sad: the plaintive sound of the bagpipes "What about me?" came a plaintive voice. Synonym
mournful

(esp. of a sound) having a sad quality: I love the plaintive sound of the bagpipes.
